SENT.plain: The article presents twenty-five year observation on 5 patients with Diamond-Blackfan anemia
In 2010 the new case of this pathology in neonate was diagnosed
Research suggests that rarely, the Diamond-Blackfan anemia may be may be the result of an aplastic anemia
To find out what the real cause of anemia is the number of reticulocytes and qualitative and quantitative indicators bone marrow should be investigated in newborns and infants
